segments.text: I see a woman standing in front of the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water cascading over the edge of the sink, just pooling on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost mesmerizing, the way the water flows so carelessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s happening at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little guilty for the children sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR
